title: Customer Experience Practical Competency Strengthening: Survey-Based Instruction for Improving Awareness of Medical Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively evaluate five domains of the medical education environment: learning perception, teaching methods, atmosphere, academic self-awareness, and social self-awareness.
Learners can analyze survey results to identify strengths and weaknesses in the educational environment.
Learners can propose customized educational environment improvement plans considering differences by gender, academic year, and major.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
